function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to incorporate epidemiological considerations in building design","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak","Mitigation":"Incorporate proper ventilation, containment spaces, and compartmentalized layouts in building designs","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, smart ventilation systems","People":"Architects, planners, developers, urban planners","Owner":"Architects, planners, developers, urban planners"},{"Description":"Lack of rethinking human movement patterns in commuter spaces","Impact":"Higher risk of disease spread in crowded transport spaces","Mitigation":"Rethink and redesign human movement patterns in transport spaces","Technologies":"Smart public transportation systems, crowd monitoring technology","People":"Transport planners, urban planners","Owner":"Transport planners, urban planners"},{"Description":"Resistance to change from the wider public","Impact":"Continued vulnerability to future pandemics","Mitigation":"Engage the wider public and raise awareness about the need for change in behavior and habits","Technologies":"Public health education campaigns, community engagement platforms","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"}]}
